solution_line_template: 15 keyboards at $20 per keyboard cost a total of {num_keyboards}*${cost_per_keyboard}=${total_keyboard_cost}<<{num_keyboards}*{cost_per_keyboard}={total_keyboard_cost}>>{total_keyboard_cost}

The total cost of printers and keyboards is ${total_cost_all_items} so {num_printers} printers cost ${total_cost_all_items}-${total_keyboard_cost}=${total_printer_cost}<<{total_cost_all_items}-{total_keyboard_cost}={total_printer_cost}>>{total_printer_cost}
